mapper.select: select seq, title, writer, contents, to_char(wdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')wdate, user_name, hit,num from( select seq ,title ,writer ,contents ,wdate ,hit ,user_name ,row_number() over(order by seq desc)num ,ceil(row_number() over(order by seq desc)/#{pgSize})-1 pg from tb_guestbook A left outer join tb_member B on A.writer=B.user_id )A where A.pg=#{pg}
